title: Spacious, modern renovated, washer and dryer in unit
posting_body: Welcome Home to The Rodney!Located in the hillside neighborhood of Los Feliz, The Rodney is just around the corner from what is considered the most pedestrian-friendly street in Los Angeles, Hillhurst Ave.
This beautiful pet-friendly community offers renovated spacious 1 and 2 bedroom floorplans with modern upgrades and in unit washer and dryer.
Here you will be able to feed your soul with the area’s best eateries or enjoy drinks at world-class cocktail lounges.

For the outdoor enthusiasts, you can catch a performance at the Greek Theatre, stargaze at Griffith Observatory or hike one of the state’s largest parks, Griffith Park; All of which are minutes from your doorstep.
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
